(5) DPT, (4) Polio, (3) Hepatitis B, (2) MMR, and (2) varicella. 7th grade students must have a Tetanus booster and a meningitis vaccine. Senior students must also have a meningitis vaccine.

Please make sure that your child is up to date on all immunizations and provide proof of new immunizations to the school. Any student not meeting requirements by September 18th will be excluded from school. This includes those students that are choosing the online option. If you have any questions please call me at 585-5981 extension 2560 or email me at smatteson@riverside.k12.oh.us

The DeGraff Village Council and The Red Cross are seeking volunteers for Saturday April 18. The Red Cross is donating and installing 75-100 brand new smoke alarms in our community! What an amazing event! They need people to help install these in homes. You must be 18 years of age or accompanied by an adult. The volunteers will be put into groups, each with a Red Cross Associate to canvas the village. The more volunteers the better!

Any seniors who participate in this event will be qualified for two scholarships that the Village of DeGraff will be giving away this year!

Please email Mrs. Kauffman, if you are willing to help and are interested in scholarships!
